meanings.definition: A person who works from home or another remote location using technology to communicate with their employer.
meanings.sent1: Telecommuters enjoy the flexibility of working from home.
meanings.sent2: Many telecommuters use video calls to stay connected with their team.
meanings.sent3: The telecommuters had a virtual coffee break together.
meanings.sent4: In the digital world, telecommuters are like modern-day nomads.
meanings.sent5: The telecommuters' productivity soared when they switched to remote work.

meanings.definition: The act of working remotely using technology to communicate with an employer.
meanings.sent1: Telecommuters have adapted well to the virtual work environment.
meanings.sent2: The company encourages telecommuting to reduce office space costs.
meanings.sent3: During the power outage, telecommuting saved the day.
meanings.sent4: Telecommuting bridges the gap between work and home life.
meanings.sent5: The future of work is shaped by telecommuters embracing remote opportunities.
